channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring by Pivotal -- Spring Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring by Pivotal -- Spring Framework

item.title: CVE-2018-1274|2024-09-17T01:11:48.375Z -- spring%20by%20pivotal -- spring%20framework
item.description: Spring Data Commons, versions 1.13 to 1.13.10, 2.0 to 2.0.5, and older unsupported versions, contain a property path parser vulnerability caused by unlimited resource allocation. An unauthenticated remote malicious user (or attacker) can issue requests against Spring Data REST endpoints or endpoints using property path parsing which can cause a denial of service (CPU and memory consumption).
